report.name: suivi_projet

dataSource.name: Q_1
dataSource.select:
-- synthese des engagements par poste
SELECT ca.clibrca clibrca, proj.icpi code_proj, proj.ilibel lib_proj, ca.codcamo codcamo, (inv.codposte|| ' - ' || p.lib_poste) poste, lig.annee annee, sum(lig.notifie*decode(lig.not_tvarecup, null,(1+t1.tva/100*(1-tr.taux/100)) ,1+lig.not_tvarecup/100)) budget, sum(pack_suivi_investissement.sum_realises_htr(TO_NUMBER(lig.codinv),TO_NUMBER(lig.codcamo),TO_NUMBER(lig.annee))) realise, sum(lig.re_estime*decode(lig.not_tvarecup, null, (1+t1.tva/100*(1-tr.taux/100)) , (1+ t2.tva/100*(1-tr.taux/100)))) reestime
FROM centre_activite ca, ligne_investissement lig, investissements inv, proj_info proj, poste p, tva t1, tva t2, taux_recup tr
WHERE --jointures inv.codposte=p.codposte AND inv.codtype = lig.type AND lig.icpi=proj.icpi AND ca.codcamo=lig.codcamo --AND tr.annee = lig.annee &P_T_WHERE AND ca.filcode = tr.filcode AND t1.datetva =(select max(TVA.datetva) from tva where datetva <= pack_suivi_investissement.cherche_date_exercice) AND t2.datetva =(select max(TVA.datetva) from tva where datetva <= to_date(lig.date_modif_re,'DD/MM/YYYY') ) --conditions --AND to_char(lig.annee)=:P_PARAM7 &P_WHERE
GROUP BY ca.codcamo, ca.clibrca , proj.icpi, proj.ilibel, inv.codposte, p.lib_poste, lig.annee

dataDescriptor.expression: sum ( lig.notifie * decode ( lig.not_tvarecup , null , ( 1 + t1.tva / 100 * ( 1 - tr.taux / 100 ) ) , 1 + lig.not_tvarecup / 100 ) )
sum ( pack_suivi_investissement.sum_realises_htr ( TO_NUMBER ( lig.codinv ) , TO_NUMBER ( lig.codcamo ) , TO_NUMBER ( lig.annee ) ) )
sum ( lig.re_estime * decode ( lig.not_tvarecup , null , ( 1 + t1.tva / 100 * ( 1 - tr.taux / 100 ) ) , ( 1 + t2.tva / 100 * ( 1 - tr.taux / 100 ) ) ) )

dataSource.name: Q_2
dataSource.select:
-- synthese des engagements par poste
SELECT proj.icpi code_proj, proj.ilibel lib_proj, (inv.codposte|| ' - ' || p.lib_poste) poste, sum(lig.notifie*decode(lig.not_tvarecup, null,(1+t1.tva/100*(1-tr.taux/100)) ,1+lig.not_tvarecup/100)) budget, sum(pack_suivi_investissement.sum_realises_htr(TO_NUMBER(lig.codinv),TO_NUMBER(lig.codcamo),TO_NUMBER(lig.annee))) realise, sum(lig.re_estime*decode(lig.not_tvarecup, null, (1+t1.tva/100*(1-tr.taux/100)) , (1+ t2.tva/100*(1-tr.taux/100)))) reestime
FROM centre_activite ca, ligne_investissement lig, investissements inv, proj_info proj, poste p, tva t1, tva t2, taux_recup tr
WHERE --jointures inv.codposte=p.codposte AND inv.codtype = lig.type AND lig.icpi=proj.icpi AND ca.codcamo=lig.codcamo --AND tr.annee = lig.annee &P_T_WHERE AND ca.filcode = tr.filcode AND t1.datetva =(select max(TVA.datetva) from tva where datetva <= pack_suivi_investissement.cherche_date_exercice) AND t2.datetva =(select max(TVA.datetva) from tva where datetva <= to_date(lig.date_modif_re,'DD/MM/YYYY') ) --conditions --AND to_char(lig.annee)=:P_PARAM7 &P_WHERE
GROUP BY proj.icpi, proj.ilibel, inv.codposte, p.lib_poste

dataDescriptor.expression: sum ( pack_suivi_investissement.sum_realises_htr ( TO_NUMBER ( lig.codinv ) , TO_NUMBER ( lig.codcamo ) , TO_NUMBER ( lig.annee ) ) )
sum ( lig.notifie * decode ( lig.not_tvarecup , null , ( 1 + t1.tva / 100 * ( 1 - tr.taux / 100 ) ) , 1 + lig.not_tvarecup / 100 ) )
sum ( lig.re_estime * decode ( lig.not_tvarecup , null , ( 1 + t1.tva / 100 * ( 1 - tr.taux / 100 ) ) , ( 1 + t2.tva / 100 * ( 1 - tr.taux / 100 ) ) ) )
